channel.title: Adding items to your class8. -Client Side
channel.description: Can someone please tell me how to add my Item ID's from my server to my client? I really need to know how. I know you go into class8. But after that, i'm clueless... I want to make this client work with my server so I can have a client to use.

item.title: Adding items to your class8. -Client Side

item.description:
@xtgscott wrote:

Can someone please tell me how to add my Item ID’s from my server to my client? I really need to know how. I know you go into class8. But after that, i’m clueless… I want to make this client work with my server so I can have a client to use.
